definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: We don't actually like Holy and Ret having SA.
sentences.chinese: 對於神聖和懲戒，我們並不希望他們有這一技能。

sentences.english: In liberal education punishment no longer exists. Teachers and students are just like friends.
sentences.chinese: 開明教育也將懲戒體罰拒之門外，倡導師生如友。

sentences.english: Acknowledgements and corrections are the more visible aspects of defusing a public relations problem.
sentences.chinese: 鳴謝和懲戒是更明顯的緩解方面的公共關係問題。

sentences.english: We want to ease off the defensive capabilities of Retribution and Holy paladins slightly.
sentences.chinese: 我們想略微降低一點懲戒與神聖聖騎士的防禦能力。

sentences.english: Judge disciplinary system regulated in The Law of Judge of China has many drawbacks.
sentences.chinese: 我國法官法規定的法官懲戒制度很多方面都存在缺陷。

sentences.english: Retribution Aura damage increased and now gains damage based on Holy spell power.
sentences.chinese: 懲戒光環傷害提高，同時可以被神聖法傷效果加成。

sentences.english: Cell confinement is also used as the primary formal disciplinary measure.
sentences.chinese: 牢房禁閉也被作爲正式的基本懲戒手段。
再次，出臺明確的懲戒標準。

sentences.english: Obviously, administrative recoupment power itself is a public power with punishment.
sentences.chinese: 行政追償權是具有懲戒性質的公權力。

sentences.english: Retribution Aura damage increased and now gai damage based on Holy ell power.
sentences.chinese: 懲戒光環傷害提高，同時可以被神聖法傷效果加成。

sentences.english: Others have criticized Mr. Greenspan for not disciplining institutions that lent indiscriminately.
sentences.chinese: 還有人批評他沒有懲戒那些肆意貸款的機構。

sentences.english: But is the most used role when leveling and soloing.
sentences.chinese: 但懲戒天賦依舊是升級和單練最常用的天賦。

sentences.english: It's revelation, soul castigation, Fire will burn us away.
sentences.chinese: 這是啓示，靈魂的懲戒，聖火將燒盡一切。
懲戒是輕易就可以付諸實踐的事情。

sentences.english: Newpaper regulations to publication disciplinary punishment measure stipulation.
sentences.chinese: 報律對報刊懲戒措施的規定。

sentences.english: Sencondly, a standardized professional mechanism for punishing academic misconduct should be set up.
sentences.chinese: 我國應建立統一專門性學術不端行爲懲戒機構體系。

definition: lit. a horse that brings trouble to its herd (idiom)/fig. troublemaker/black sheep/rotten apple
